Name: Scottish Breakfast
Ingredients: 15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
Review: Scotch sweetened with maple syrup, flavoured with calvados and smoothed with cream.
History: Created in 2009 by Erick Castro at Rickhouse , San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Scottish Breakfast contains 269 calories
